channel.title: [508] NPC list help
channel.description:
Ok well I don't understand everything about it, heres an example.
[code]npc = 6247 596 500 31 2 0 150 100 3 Commander_Zilyana Commander_of_Saradomin's_forces.[/code] I already know what some of it means, but not everything. If you could please explain it. heres what I know.
6247 = NPC ID 500 = HP Commander Zilyana = Name of NPC "commander of saradomin forces" = examine info
Whats the rest of it?

item.title: [508] NPC list help
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

die means to drop dead so by default thats the death emote

as i said explains itself

Read full topic

item.title: [508] NPC list help
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

considering I just started coding for 508s and didn’t have anything like this in 317s no it doesn’t…What could die possibly mean? and I figured out the NN and ND that part was obvious. But i’ve thought about it, I can’t figure out what the others are.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] NPC list help
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Ok well I don’t understand everything about it, heres an example.

npc	=	6247	596	500	31	2	0	150	100	3	Commander_Zilyana	Commander_of_Saradomin's_forces.

I already know what some of it means, but not everything. If you could please explain it. heres what I know.

6247 = NPC ID
500 = HP
Commander Zilyana = Name of NPC
“commander of saradomin forces” = examine info

Whats the rest of it?

Read full topic
